summary: Completed comprehensive testing of coach account creation journey. All 3-step flow requirements verified: email input → link sent confirmation → profile setup with name/brand/color picker → dashboard redirect with personalized welcome.
passed_tests: Coach registration: /register?type=coach shows email input with SEND ME A LOGIN LINK button
After email submit, shows 'Create account link sent!' with checkmark icon
After OK click, shows 'Let's get to know you' with First Name, Last Name, Brand Name fields
Color Theme picker shows 8 color options with checkmark on selected theme
Brand Name field only appears for coach registration (not member)
After SAVE, redirects to /dashboard with personalized 'Welcome, {firstName}!' message
Dashboard sidebar shows updated navigation: Home, Profile, Members, Library, Live, Challenges, Add link, Support
Member registration at /register (without ?type=coach) does NOT show Brand Name or Color Theme
Member registration redirects to home page (/) instead of dashboard
All form validations working (terms acceptance, required fields)
Profile data persistence and user creation working
Color theme selection with visual feedback working
